title: Comprehensive Services for Your Healthcare Journey
subtitle: Our dedicated care managers provide personalized assistance at every stage. All services are complimentary - you only pay for your medical treatment.
freeNotice: All our services are FREE - your hospital bill remains unchanged!

medicalOpinion.title: Medical Opinion & Cost Analysis
medicalOpinion.description: Receive expert medical opinions and detailed cost breakdowns from leading specialists.

preTravelConsult.title: Pre-Travel Consultation
preTravelConsult.description: Comprehensive guidance about your procedure, preparation, and what to expect during your visit.

visaSupport.title: Visa Assistance
visaSupport.description: Complete medical visa support and documentation assistance for hassle-free travel.

currencyExchange.title: Currency Exchange
currencyExchange.description: Convenient currency exchange services available at competitive rates in your destination city.

interpreters.title: Language Interpreters
interpreters.description: Professional interpreters to ensure clear communication with medical staff at all times.

transportation.title: Transportation Services
transportation.description: Complimentary airport transfers and local transportation for all medical appointments.

accommodation.title: Accommodation Arrangements
accommodation.description: Comfortable lodging options near hospitals, tailored to your budget and preferences.

admissionSupport.title: Hospital Coordination
admissionSupport.description: Complete assistance with hospital admission, appointments, and pharmacy needs.

nursingCare.title: Private Nursing Care
nursingCare.description: Arrangements for dedicated private nursing care when medically required.
